name: Intelligent Design (Karl Zylinski, magdafisch)
description:
Skogstokigt. Left and right arrow switches currently focused bodypart. Enter starts the game and escape takes you back to the title screen.

                               Art       Magdalena Fischerström — @emefisch
Music and sound       Karl Flodin — http://karlflodin.com — @actually_karl
       Programming       Karl Zylinski — http://zylinski.se — @karl_zylinski


Source: https://github.com/karl-zylinski/intelligent-design (also downloadable as zip below)
